subject: Now is time for a change
body:
Do you have a telephone and can return calls?

If so call me now at 8OO - 691 - 4528 to hear my message.

You can generate a great living for simply returning phone calls.

I know it sounds to good to be tru but this is not a joke.

Call 8OO - 691 - 4528

I look forward to hearing from you

Later




You may option out at anytime
